subject: Books and Literature
Baseball
Writing and Writers
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Asinof’s journalistic re-creation of a 1919 Black Sox scandal, “Eight Men Out,” became a classic of baseball literature and narrative nonfiction.
snippet: Mr. Asinof’s journalistic re-creation of a 1919 Black Sox scandal, “Eight Men Out,” became a classic of baseball literature and narrative nonfiction.
